# invalidateDetents()

**Instance Method**

Notifies the sheet to re-evaluate its detent value in the next layout pass.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func invalidateDetents()
```

## Discussion

When an external input (like a captured property) to a custom detent changes, call this method to notify the sheet to re-evaluate the detent.

To animate custom detents to their new heights, call this method within [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISheetPresentationController/animateChanges(_:)].
